pullRequest.title: Add support for downloading packages using LocalPackageStore
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a Local Cache and Mock Package Repository
Updates current API to use the above
Test added to validate functionality of the download API

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

beforeCommit.message: Add support for downloading packages using LocalPackageStore

afterCommit.message: Add support for downloading packages using LocalPackageStore

nodes.bodyText: Why use a custom serializer, why not just create a separate json getter which returns a string?
Can artifacts be null? If so, let's change that so it can only return an empty list.
It is probably better to throw a PackageNotFoundException instead of returning Optional. That way the caller doesn't need to handle another case (optional case).
